title: Scripter
body: The Graves GaryBB is a scripter, everyone in my team confirmed it, i cant send LoL replay files.. how do i show the evidence

replies.body: Plz no name and shame - erino

what "proof" do you have he was scripting?

Because most times the proof is shit, and it's just bronzies thinking they know what the difference between reactions and scripting is.
You can show the evidence by placing it neatly in your bum.

http://i.gyazo.com/b05916cb1049cae44df301467a18f821.png

Pretty awful scripter if you ask me, don't name and shame.
Also you beat him, why are you crying?
Just because someone scripts doesn't mean they win every game or get fed.

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=myBuVRs1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-17T09:17:31.190+0000)
